headline: NiSource Appoints Durgesh Chopra Vice President of Investor Relations
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., July 03, 2025--NiSource Inc. will welcome Durgesh Chopra as the company's new Vice President of Investor Relations on July 7.
